text: Avraham Hirchson (, 11 February 1941 â€“ 7 March 2022) was an Israeli politician. He was a member of the Knesset for Likud and Kadima between 1981 and 1984, and again from 1992 until 2009. He was Minister of Communications (2006), Minister of Finance (2006-2007) and Minister of Tourism (2005-2006). He resigned after being accused of corruption. He lost his re-elected to the Knesset in 2009. Hirschson was born in Tel Mond, Mandatory Palestine.
